articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Behavior under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Behavior under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council Saturday made public a statement denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for escalating confrontation with all the Koreans greeting the New Year. 
					 Traitor Lee let loose a spate of malignant outbursts crying out for defending "the northern limit line" from the outset of the year. 
					
					 "Defense Minister" Kim Kwan Jin and "Unification Minister" Ryu U Ik made such provocative outbursts as "perfect tough posture," "punishment" and "wrong choice of the north".
					
					 The group went the lengths of hurling its soldiers into firing toward the north from an area along the Military Demarcation Line. Moreover, it prodded human scum into the operation for scattering leaflets slandering dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					  The group's confrontation row is an unpardonable insult to all Koreans desirous of national reconciliation and unity and a blatant challenge to the unanimous desire of the fellow countrymen for reunification. It is also an intolerable hideous provocation to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The vulgar, ignorant, incompetent and hysteric Lee Myung Bak and his group steeped in sycophancy and extreme enmity against fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones are bound to opt for confrontation and war. This was fully evidenced by the past five years of his office.
					
					 The madcap confrontation racket kicked up by Lee, Kim Kwan Jin, Ryu U Ik and other human scum from the outset of the year is a revelation of its wicked and dangerous nature to make the next regime carry forward its confrontation policy.
					
					 All the Koreans should rise up as one in the final nation-wide struggle to mercilessly wipe out the Lee group of rats, the root cause of the nation's misfortune and sufferings, which is keen on the moves to bring the tragedy of bigger disasters to the nation through extreme confrontation with fellow countrymen after blocking the Koreans in their way to achieve reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 All the Koreans should resolutely meet the challenge of the anti-reunification forces by their concerted efforts and open a new phase of national reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Vow to Implement Tasks Set forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Vow to Implement Tasks Set forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang City mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Saturday to carry out the important tasks set forth in the historic New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The square was crowded with people from all walks of life.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party and state officials. 
					
					 Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, made a report. 
					
					 He said Kim Jong Un's televised New Year Address serves as a important guideline indicating the path of the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and a militant banner calling upon all the service personnel and people across the country to turn out in the general advance for bringing about a turning point in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A firm guarantee was provided for brilliantly carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche to completion under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said, and went on:
					
					 Through the worthwhile drive last year all the service personnel and people were convinced that the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to be accomplished under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He stressed the need for officials, party members and other people in Pyongyang to perform greater miracles and innovations this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War in hearty response to the New Year Address.
					
					 He called for more splendidly sprucing up Pyongyang as befits the capital of Juche Korea and Songun cultural hub, true to Kim Jong Un's idea of building a highly civilized power. 
					
					 The report was followed by speeches.
					
					 An Jong Su, minister of Light Industry, said that modernization of light industrial factories would be steadily pushed forward and raw material bases of local industrial factories be consolidated and the management of equipment and technical control improved to increase the production of quality consumer goods favored by people.
					
					 Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, renewed the pledge to dynamically wage the drive for pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology in the same spirit as were displayed in successfully launching satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, develop the nation's science and technology as soon as possible and give fuller play to the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Jong Yong Suk, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Rihyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, vowed to raise the level of scientific and intensive farming and establish a cyclic production system and thus attain the goal of grain production this year without fail.
					
					 Ri Kun Chol, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that it is a firm faith and will of the young people to become a reliable scout party of the ranks of the general advance in glorifying this significant year as the one of great creation and change, adding that the young people in Pyongyang will become young heroes making breakthrough towards victory in every work site of building an economic power.

articles.title: Service Personnel of Ministry of People's Security Vow to Protect This Year's Advance with Arms and Law
articles.content:
Service Personnel of Ministry of People's Security Vow to Protect This Year's Advance with Arms and Law
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Ministry of People's Security held a meeting on Jan. 5 to carry out the important tasks Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of the ministry and people's security men and service personnel of the KPISF.
					
					 A report was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the Supreme Commander's New Year Address fully reflected the iron-will and grandiose plan of the Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu to demonstrate great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea before the whole world and clearly indicated tasks that the army and the people of the DPRK should hold fast to as guidelines in the new year's advance.
					
					 Thanks to the experienced and tested leadership of the dear respected Supreme Commander the DPRK will emerge the strongest power in the world to be envied by the world and the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph, they noted. This is the iron-willed truth the army and the people learned in their struggle last year, 
					
					 They vowed to firmly defend this year's gigantic advance to build a thriving socialist nation with arms and law in hearty response to the important tasks set forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 They said they would complete the major construction projects assigned to them as monumental structures in the era of Songun faster and more splendidly in the spirit of offensive of Mt. Paektu and the spirit of "At a go".

articles.title: DPRK People Encouraged by Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
DPRK People Encouraged by Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Working people in the fields of agriculture and light industry of the DPRK have turned out in the efforts to improve the standard of people's living, encouraged by the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 Hong Myong Gwan, a work-team head of the Wonhwa Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "In his New Year address, the dear respected Kim Jong Un said that the success in economic construction should be manifested in the people's standard of living.
					
					 I will work harder to put farming on a scientific and intensive basis and apply the ring-shaped rotation production system to agricultural production in order to hit the yearly target for grain output."
					
					 Ri Thae Sok, chief engineer of the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, said:
					
					 "Kim Jong Un's New Year address based on his deep love for the people made me sorely miss leader Kim Jong Il. The New ï¼¹ear address calls for big efforts to developing light industry, along with agriculture.
					
					 I will do my best to produce quality hosiery in large quantities this year, true to his noble intention. My factory will take the lead in this year's drive for the improvement of people's standard of living."
					
					 Yu Jong Sik, a shock-brigade member taking part in the project for reclaiming the Sepho tableland, said:
					
					 "I will devote myself to carrying into practice the Workers' Party of Korea's grandiose nature-remaking plan for turning the Sepho tableland into a large-scale integrated stockbreeding base."

articles.title: Modern Sporting Centers Appear in DPRK
articles.content:
Modern Sporting Centers Appear in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The year 2012 witnessed a number of modern sporting centers in the capital city of Pyongyang and local areas in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 In April, the Taekwon-Do Holy Center was opened in Chongchun Street in Pyongyang, with a total floor space of more than ten thousand square meters. 
					
					 In October, a sports village made its appearance on the Yanggak Islet in the middle of the River Taedong, which is heated by geotherm.
					
					 The People's Open-air Ice Rink and the Skate Park were built on the bank of the River Taedong while nearly 20 parks in Pyongyang have been face-lifted, furnished with sports and amusement facilities.
					
					 A synthetic-grass football stadium was built for the Wolmido Sports Team and a fitness center appeared in Thongil Street. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung Stadium and Sosan Football Stadium, combat sports and table-tennis gymnasiums in Chongchun Street were renovated.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik University of Education had a gymnasium and an open-air stadium built on a modern basis.
					
					 Similar gymnasiums were built in Nampho Port and Pyokdong County, North Phyongan Province.
					
					 Jonchon County, Jagang Province, finished building a swimming pool at its health complex and new folklore game grounds sprung up in Uiju and Nyongbyon counties, North Phyongan Province.

articles.title: Bitter Cold Lasts in DPRK
articles.content:
Bitter Cold Persists in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has experienced very cold weather from December 30 last year.
					 During the days, the lowest temperature was as low as minus 21.3 degrees Celsius in Sinuiju, minus 21.9 degrees Celsius in Phyongsong and minus 16.9 degrees Celsius in Sariwon, according to the Hydro-meteorological Service.
					
					 On January 4, Sariwon witnessed minus 20 degrees Celsius, Pyongyang minus 21.6 degrees Celsius and Phyongsong minus 22 degrees Celsius, the lowest in the current winter season.
					
					 On January 3-4, the highest temperature in the west coastal area stood at between minus 12 degrees Celsius and minus 9 degrees Celsius, in the northern inland area between minus 19 degrees Celsius and minus 15 degrees Celsius and in the east coastal area between minus 10 degrees Celsius and minus 3 degrees Celsius, 6 to 12 degrees lower than the average year throughout the country.
					
					 It is believed that dry and cold air above central Siberia is steadily moving towards the Korean Peninsula, affected by the cold continental high pressure, and snow-covered land reflects the sunlight, causing cold spell in the country.
					
					 It is forecast that the cold will abate a little from Saturday, but continue until January 11, with 3 to 7 degrees lower than the average.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Denounced for Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Denounced for Confrontation Racket 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is frantically kicking up a racket for confrontation with compatriots from the outset of the year. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a vicious challenge to all Koreans who desire improved north-south relations. 
					
					 The Lee regime let loose such invectives against the DPRK as "provocations" and need to defend "the northern limit line" while giving up even the annual opening ceremony for the year. It staged live-shell firing and other war drills in the forefront area. These were rare developments. 
					
					 The Lee group of traitors has got frantic with confrontation with fellow countrymen in the entire period of its office. But, upset by the trend of the times, it is making last-ditch efforts to justify the confrontation policy and keep the next regime in "the framework of its policy towards the north". 
					
					 It is imperative to eliminate all traitors who know nothing but confrontation and war in order to dispel the danger of war from the Korean nation and pave the wide avenue for peace and reunification. 
					
					 This is the lesson the Korean nation drew once again from the reckless behavior of the Lee group. 
					
					 Now all Koreans sharply watch whether the south Korean ruling quarters will persist in confrontation with fellow countrymen which will lead to a war, despite the trend of the times, or they will choose reconciliation, unity and national reunification, the way to peace and co-prosperity. 
					
					 Those seeking confrontation and war are bound to meet stern punishment by history and the nation.

articles.title: New Year Greeted by Koreans Overseas
articles.content:
New Year Greeted by Koreans Overseas 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- An event for laying a floral basket before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan on the New Year.
					 Present there were Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, and other officials and compatriots.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits and paid tribute.
					
					 An event for placing a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting depicting Kim Il Sung standing together with Kim Jong Il was held at the DPRK embassy in Uzbekistan on the same day.
					
					 Present there were Chairman Ju Yong Il, Vice-Chairman Ko Tae Chun of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, members of compatriots organizations, heads of several art troupes of compatriots and other overseas Koreans.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to them after laying a floral basket and bouquets.
					
					 They listened to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Vow to Work Hard for National Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Vow to Work Hard for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans evinced their determination to intensify the reunification movement in warm response to the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Jang Sun Jong, chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, noted in a statement on Thursday that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address clarified his firm will to achieve national reunification without fail, true to the life-long desire of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their behests and clearly indicated tasks and ways for waging a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					 Jang declared that all Koreans in Russia would stage a dynamic patriotic movement for reunification for checking and frustrating the moves of the anti-reunification forces and opening a new phase in national reunification in this historic year, the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, said in a statement on Wednesday that Kim Jong Un is a peerless patriot who works heart and soul for national reunification true to the patriotic intention and behests of the Generalissimos, deeply grieving over the national division.
					
					 He called on all Koreans in China to intensify the struggle to hasten the independent reunification of Korea and thus adorn this year as a year shining in the history of the reunification movement of the nation.

articles.title: General Association of Koreans in China Vows to Work Hard to Build Thriving Nation
articles.content:
General Association of Koreans in China Vows to Work Hard to Build Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Jan. 2 reflecting the feelings of the Koreans in China who received the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un with excitement. 
					 The statement recalled that he extended his warm greetings to compatriots in the south and abroad who are ringing in the New Year and the world's progressive people and foreign friends who love justice and peace.
					
					 In the address, he proudly reviewed historic events last year which fully glorified the immortal revolutionary activities of the Songun brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu and demonstrated the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the great Paektusan nation before the whole world, the statement said.
					
					 The address clearly indicated the tasks to be fulfilled for building a thriving socialist nation, strengthening the Korean People's Army and achieving the country's reunification, it noted.
					
					 All the officials of the association and Koreans in China will keep pace with all service personnel and people in the homeland and carry on the dynamic struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the country's reunification in warm response to his New Year Address, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Reported Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Reported Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The full text of the speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the banquet given for the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was posted on the Russian internet magazine Hanber Journal and internet homepages of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on December 22 and 26 last year.
					 The Russian magazine carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised by Foreign Newspapers
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on December 19 and 24 last year on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The Russian newspaper Rio Panorama carried an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It reported that he put the defence capability of the country on a high level.
					
					 The Russian newspaper Selskaya Zhizn also carried an article praising his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 The Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao edited an article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" accompanied with a portrait of the smiling leader.
					
					 It stressed that the long journey of Songun made by Kim Jong Il to defend the country, weathering difficulties, was a rugged and death-defying path hard to traverse.
					
					 Thanks to his self-sacrificing dedication to the country and its people, the DPRK ranked itself among the world's satellite manufacturers and launchers and nuclear weapons states, it reported.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Ekota carried an article praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il, who frustrated the imperialists' offensive to stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun and ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Persons Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Persons Introduced by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups or aired special programs on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the 1st anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 95th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Iranian newspaper Iran News on December 25 last year carried articles illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and a photo of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Guardian of socialism" praised Kim Jong Il for making an immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The paper said in an article titled "First anniversary of HE Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership" that his assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA provided a sure guarantee for further glorifying the great exploits Kim Jong Il performed for building the army and advancing the cause of Songun generation after generation.
					
					 A Russian internet magazine carried articles illustrated with photos of the peerlessly great persons every day from December 20 to 26 last year.
					
					 The Nepali newspaper Arpan, the Pakistani newspaper Baluchistan Times and internet homepage News Network of China carried articles introducing the noble career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, in the period between December 23 and 26 last year.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- There took place in foreign countries functions to celebrate the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of the post.
					 Meetings, seminars, lectures and film shows were held in Italy, Benin, Nigeria and Bangladesh from Dec. 12 to 19 last year.
					
					 Participants of film shows watched Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The national coordinator of the Italian Communist Youth Front said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who dedicated his all to the happiness of the Korean people and the prosperity of the country, and an outstanding revolutionary who made distinguished contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il developed KPA into an army strong enough to foil any aggression by the imperialist allied forces and placed the position of the DPRK on the status of a nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher. 
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un instilled stronger conviction of sure victory into the service personnel and people of the country while making a journey for Songun revolutionary leadership in the entire period of last year and thus made enemies tremble with fear.
					
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the DPRK will keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism will shed its eternal rays as a banner of victory.

articles.title: Polish Internet Homepage Opens Photo Exhibition
articles.content:
Polish Internet Homepage Opens Photo Exhibition 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Polish Internet homepage "The DPRK" opened a photo exhibition on Dec. 29 last year on the occasion of the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The homepage showed a photo of leader Kim Jong Il standing with Kim Jong Un under the caption "The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA".
					
					 It also posted more than 20 photos of Kim Jong Un leading the overall affairs of the party, state and army.
					
					 An article posted on the homepage says: Dec. 30 is the first anniversary of supreme leader of the Korean people Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA. We have the pleasure to open a photo exhibition recollecting the historic course in which he led the army and people of the DPRK for the last one year.

articles.title: Mitin por materializar tareas presentadas por Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Mitin por materializar tareas presentadas por Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de mas de 100 mil pyongyaneses para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					En el mitin estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico, secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El informante senalo que el primer mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal es la guia programatica que ilumino el camino verdadero de Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la bandera combativa que llama a todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea a la marcha general para abrir la fase trascendental de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					El ano pasado, bajo la direccion del Mariscal el pueblo coreano aseguro la firme garantia que permite heredar y cumplir con exito la causa revolucionaria del Juche, subrayo.
					
					Destaco que en medio de los orgullosos trabajos del ano pasado sintio que gracias al Mariscal saldra siempre victoriosa la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Enfatizo que en pleno acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal los funcionarios, miembros del partido y trabajadores de la capital deben registrar el gran milagro y milagro en este ano en que se cumplen el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y el 60o de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Se refirio a la necesidad de acondicionar mas magnificamente la ciudad de Pyongyang como digna capital de la Corea del Juche y centro de la cultura de Songun, llevando a cabo el proposito del Mariscal en materia de la construccion de la potencia civilizada. 
					
					Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones.
					
					El ministro de Industria Ligera An Jong Su, destaco que preparara las bases de materias primas de las fabricas de la industria local impulsando la modernizacion de las fabricas de la industria ligera y producira muchos articulos de consumo que ganan reputacion de los usuarios haciendo bien la administracion de los equipos y la tecnica.
					
					El presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias Jang Chol, dijo que con el espiritu de haber lanzado exitosamente la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3" desarrollara mas la ciencia y la tecnologia general del pais desplegando una campana para superar las tecnologias de punta  y exaltara la dignidad y el poderio del pais.
					
					Jong Yong Suk, presidenta de la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Rihyon del municipio de Sadong, juro elevar el nivel cientifico e intensivo en la produccion agricola y establecer el sistema de produccion circular entre ganaderia y agricultura para cumplir a toda costa el plan de produccion de cereales de este ano.
					
					Ri Kun Chol, presidente del comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la ciudad de Pyongyang, senalo que es la conviccion y voluntad inconmovibles de todos los jovenes hacer patrulla de la fila de marcha general para glorificar este ano significativo como un ano de creacion y cambio gigantescos y agrego que seria heroe juvenil en lograr exitos en los campos de trabajo.

articles.title: Militares del MINSEP juran cumplir las tareas del ano nuevo
articles.content:
Militares del MINSEP juran cumplir las tareas del ano nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 el mitin de los militares del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo (MINSEP) para jurar el cumplimiento de las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su primer mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Ri Myong Su, el jefe de la Direccion Politica del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea (ESIPC), Ri Pyong Sam, los oficiales del MINSEP, los oficiales y soldados del ESIPC.
					
					Hubo informe e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que en el referido mensaje del Mariscal, estan sintetizados la ferrea voluntad y magno proyecto de ese general insigne del monte Paektu de glorificar en todo el mundo a la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y presentadas las tareas combativas que sirven de guia para el ejercito y pueblo coreanos en la marcha del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Gracias a la probada y diestra guia del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la patria emergera como potencia envidiada por el mundo y es definitiva la victoria de la causa de construccion de Estado prospero, esto es la verdad de que aprendieron los militares y habitantes coreanos en su lucha del ano pasado, recalcaron.
					
					Expresaron la decision de cumplir las tareas del mensaje del Ano Nuevo y defender fidedignamente con armas y la ley la majestuosa marcha de este ano para construir un Estado prospero.
					
					Aseveraron que construiran mas rapido como creaciones monumentales de la era del Songun los importantes objetos de construccion trabajando con el espiritu de ofensiva del monte Paektu y el coraje "De un tiron".

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN condena la campana conflictiva de banda surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN condena la campana conflictiva de banda surcoreana
						
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) publico el dia 5 una declaracion para condenar la campana conflictiva que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak lanza contra toda la nacion coreana ya desde el comienzo del Ano Nuevo.
					  Desde el principio de este ano, el traidor surcoreano Lee dijo unos chismes como la defensa de la "linea de limite al Norte".
					
					  El ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin y el de Unificacion Ryu U Ik pronunciaron por turno otras palabras provocativas como "perfecto estado de alerta", "represalia correspondiente" y "mala opcion del Norte".
					
					  Para colmo, los traidores surcoreanos realizaron el tiro de combate en las inmediaciones de la linea de demarcacion militar y lanzaron a una chusma a lanzar volantes que calumnian la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Tal ola de enfrentamiento es insulto insoportable y desafio frontal a toda la nacion coreana deseosa de reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion y peor provocacion contra la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC, dijo el portavoz en su nota y continuo:
					
					  Los 5 anos pasados del mandato de Lee Myung Bak y sus compinches comprobaron que estos tipejos ignorantes, histericos e incapaces no tomaran otra opcion que el enfrentamiento y la guerra porque encarnan atributos de vendepatrias y extremada hostilidad a la connacional RPDC.
					
					Revelo que el escandalo conflictivo que libran desde los primeros dias del Ano Nuevo las escorias humanas incluyendo Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin y Ryu U Ik, resulta una intencion mala y peligrosa tendente a continuar su politica de enfrentamiento hasta en el proximo "gobierno".
					
					Apunto que toda la nacion coreana debe movilizarse en la magna lucha final para aniquilar despiadadamente a la horda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak, causa de desgracias y angustias nacionales, que recurre con frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida bloqueando la reintegracion territorial para traer la tragedia de gran arruinamiento nacional. 
					
					Asevero que todos los coreanos deben frustrar rotundamente con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana el desafio de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y abrir nueva coyuntura de reunificacion de la patria bajo la declaracion conjunta N-S.

articles.title: Levantadas por doquier del pais muchas facilidades deportivas
articles.content:
Levantadas por doquier del pais muchas facilidades deportivas
						
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- A lo largo del ano pasado, se construyeron por doquier del pais muchas instalaciones deportivas que contribuyen a la consolidacion de la base material y tecnica para la construccion de una potencia deportiva.
					En abril del ano pasado, quedo inaugurado en el capitalino Reparto Chongchun el centro de Taekwon-Do con una superficie arquitectonica de 10 y tantos mil metros cuadrados.
					
					En el estan distribuidos el salon de la historia de Taekwon-Do, los otros de ejercicios y reuniones internacionales, la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos, las instalaciones de servicios publicos, etc.
					
					En octubre, se ha levantado en el islote Yanggak, enclavado en el pintoresco rio Taedong, la villa deportiva Yanggakdo que tiene albergues con el sistema de calefaccion por equipos geotermicos, gimnasios, sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte, bano sauna y otras instalaciones.
					
					Han sido inaugurados el Centro de Patinaje al Aire Libre del Pueblo y el patinadero de ruedas mientras casi 20 parques de esta capital fueron remodelados con canchas de baloncesto, voleibol, tenis, mini-golf y patinaje de ruedas.
					
					En el Conjunto Deportivo Wolmido fue acondicionado un campo de futbol con cesped artificial y entro en la operacion el magnifico Centro de Gimnasia de la Avenida Thong-il.
					
					Fueron modernizados el Estadio Kim Il Sung, el Campo de Futbol de Sosan, el centro de atletismo pesado y el otro de ping-pong del Reparto Chongchun.
					
					En la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik fueron construidos en alta calidad el gimnasio, el campo de deportes y las canchas de entrenamiento.
					
					En el Puerto Nampho se ha levantado un gimnasio polivalente.
					
					En la cabecera del distrito de Pyokdong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte fue inaugurado un estadio capaz de auspiciar los juegos de mas de 20 deportes y en Undokwon (casa de servicios publicos) del distrito de Jonchon de la provincia de Jagang fue construida una piscina.
					
					Ademas, en los distritos de Uiju, Nyongbyon y otros fueron acondicionadas las zonas de juegos folkloricos.
